definitions.definition: any of a group of unicellular, multicellular, or syncytial spore-producing organisms feeding on organic matter, including molds, yeast, mushrooms, and toadstools.
examples: mushroom, toadstool; Moremold, mildew, rust; saprophyte "the fungus will flourish in a dark, moist environment"Moremold, mildew, rust; saprophyte the fungus will flourish in a dark, moist environment

definitions.definition: used to describe something that has appeared or grown rapidly and is considered unpleasant or unattractive.
examples: there was a fungus of outbuildings behind the house
